personalDetails.moreAboutMe: I am a full stack software developer with over 3 years professional experinece in python and javascript. I enjoy playing soccer and working on interesting projects. I have had the opportunity of working for some amazing companies. Presently I work full time with Andela building Internal projects and also working with Andela partners. I also have over one year expereince working remotely with team members spanning various time zones.
